dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4776 IH: Hospital Preparedness Reauthorization Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a program of partnerships for State and regional hospital preparedness to improve surge capacity.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Hospital Preparedness Reauthorization Act of 2018.

section.header: Reauthorization of partnerships for State and regional hospital preparedness To improve surge capacity
section.text: Section 319C–2(j)(1) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 247d–3b(j)(1)) is amended by striking $374,700,000 for each of fiscal years 2014 through 2018 and inserting $515,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023.
